reviewText: Max Lucado confronts head-on the different fears we all have that determine who we are as a person.  When we understand and confront these fears by faith in God, we become a more effective Christian.  The accompanying video, with Max Lucado speaking, gives a much greater insight into each lesson.  The DVD-based study is dependent upon first having read the appropriate chapter in the book "Fearless."  The "Fearless" book has fifteen chapters of which only six are covered in the DVD-based study.  What a shame!  I truly wish Max covered all 15 chapters.  It's that good.
